divs: Sighting Detailsi saw a black chopper circle my house then one after the other one minutte intervals triangle shaped craft flew over my house making no sound, they hovered n changed direction. It had pulsating blue and red lights from the outside of the triangle to the center in rings like the pentagon. 6 ppl saw this over a week every night at midnight.
Summary: 17 triangle stealths hovered over my house
